item.description:
We have a bunch of new members. Let's get together sometime in sept. Please tell me when, where and at what time is good for you. We can discuss any issue that you have and help each other with ideas that have worked for us and others. If you would like a POLL on the subject, send me some ?s to have voted on. Now it is your turn. thanx, dale

The suggestion for a meeting at A B P sounds good to me. What do you think? Please let me know./ dale
item.name: when! Time to choose, How about, Au Bon Pain at Kendall Sq.
